mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_AUTO_PARKING_SETTING VALUES(#{accountNo}, (SELECT PARKINGDATE FROM T_MYONE WHERE ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo}) )
mapper.select: SELECT A.FROMPOCKET AS FROMPOCKET, A.PARKINGAMOUNT AS PARKINGAMOUNT, B.PARKINGCODE FROM T_AUTO_PARKING A, (SELECT MAX(PARKINGCODE) AS PARKINGCODE FROM T_AUTO_PARKING WHERE FROMPOCKET='고정비') B WHERE ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo} AND FROMPOCKET='고정비'
